description:
The release of Disney’s live-action Snow White remake is bringing controversy both old and new to the forefront. Now Melissa Barrera, who was controversially fired from Scream 7 following her own social media drama, has taken a stand to defend Snow White star Rachel Zegler. The two stars have both showed their support for Palestine [...]

The post Melissa Barrera Defends ‘Snow White’ Star Rachel Zegler appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Melissa Barrera Defends ‘Snow White’ Star Rachel Zegler

description:
Fans of the Minecraft video game franchise have waited a long time for the theatrical Minecraft movie to come to fruition. Now it looks like their excitement has become heightened enough for police to reportedly be called. According to some sources, cops were called over a screening of A Minecraft Movie due to the audience’s [...]

title: Cops Reportedly Called Over ‘A Minecraft Movie’ “Chicken Jockey” Scene
